thread.title: Kawhi Leonard is so good at defense he is stealing the ball from his own teammates
thread.title_full: Kawhi Leonard is so good at defense he is stealing the ball from his own teammates

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Kawhi Leonard is so good at defense he is stealing the ball from his own teammates
text:
Sneaky quick!
Kawhi Leonard is arguably the best defender in the entire NBA. See example below:
He is so good and so sneaky that he can steal the ball from his own teammate and his teammate has no idea what happened. Pau Gasol was actually so caught off guard that he had a larger than life reaction to the incident.
Gasol is doing one of the following: 
A) Doing the YMCA dance 
B) Confirming a game-winning field goal
C) Performing a massive flop after his own teammate took the ball from him
You be the judge.
